strapiPost.title: New Kitchen + Pub Opening In Fayetteville Next Week
strapiPost.content:
A new spot to dine, watch sports games, and hangout is coming to Fayetteville in the form of a new restaurant near Dickson Street.

  • Updated space: The new spot will be a kitchen + pub called The Hills Hideaway, located at 401 W. Watson St. The space was formerly home to The Grillhouse, Table on the Hill, and Legacy Blues. The owners of The Hills Hideaway have modernized the building and added televisions for game watching. 
  • Time to dine: The Hills Hideaway is scheduled to open on Monday, June 27. It will be open for lunch and dinner and serve appetizers, sandwiches, soups, salads, and “delicious mains” influenced by the owners' costal upbringings.

For more information, click HERE.
